title: Glenn Gould Radio Documentaries
description:
Glenn Gould made a number of highly original radio documentaries for the CBC, layering and interweaving multiple speech, music, and sound tracks to a achieve an effect he called "contrapuntal radio".  Primary among these are the Solitude Trilogy and a brilliant documentary about Stokowski.  Also included is a piece about Casals, which I find kind of annoying.

File format is Apple Lossless.
